title: Ride booking web application
description: Developed a comprehensive ride booking app with features for route mapping and user authentication. Successfully managed the entire development process from conception to deployment.

title: Context API demo
description: Developed a demo project showcasing the capabilities of Context API for efficient state management in React applications. Demonstrated the seamless sharing of state across multiple components without prop drilling.

title: Password generator
description: Developed a password generator web app designed to create strong, secure passwords for users. The app features customizable options for length and complexity to enhance online security.

title: Currency Converter
description: Developed a currency converter web app utilizes APIs to provide real-time and accurate currency exchange rates, ensuring users get the most current information for their conversions.

title: Quiz App
description: Developed an engaging quiz app designed to test and enhance users' knowledge on various topics. This app offers an interactive experience with a wide range of questions.
